CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
' Rev 5.4.0 added checks for TeamEx
' Rev 5.3.0 2009  Cleaned up report to group by Donor.
'Rev 2.3.4 xxAwardDonor Post Fair Report
' THis report is the 'script' report - Modified to produce a list of
' all awards and the details about who won the award
' The sort groups and filter were modified and of course fields were added.
' Some but NOT much attempt attempt to clean up
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private msg As String
Private LastExn As Integer
Private LastAN As Integer
Private NextAN As Integer
Private LastGN As Integer
Private AwdRetreat As Integer
Private NewPage As Boolean
Private PrintSSN As Boolean
Private SSNValueTest As Integer

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
'GroupHeader1 is Award Data
  LastAN = Me.AN
  AwdRetreat = 0
End Sub

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Retreat()
 'GroupHeader 1 is Award Data
 If AwdRetreat = 0 Then
   NextAN = Me.AN
 Else
   LastAN = Me.AN
 End If
 AwdRetreat = AwdRetreat + 1
End Sub

Private Sub GroupHeader1_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
 'GroupHeader1 is Award Data
End Sub
Private Sub GroupHeader2_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
'GroupHeader2 is Group Data

End Sub


Private Sub GroupHeader2_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
 'GroupHeader 2 is Group Data
End Sub

Private Sub PageHeaderSection_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
   ' removed all rev 5.3.0
   ' Dim count As Integer
   '  If Me.AN = LastAN Then
   '  End If
   '  If NextAN <> LastAN And Me.AN <> 0 Then
   '    Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""
   '  Else
   '    Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""   ' later"TEST *********************"
   '  End If
 End Sub
Private Sub Detail_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
' Detail is Prize Data and Winner Data
 ' The  'NewPage' part no work yet - trying to put awardname and group desc on
 ' top of report when it continues on next page  (could set property repeat = yes)
 ' but this does not add the word continued and repeats the Award description also
 '  way too much info.   next try doing this in the print events instead of the
 ' format events
 ' If NewPage = True And (Me.AN = LastAN And Me.GrpGN = LastGN) Then
 '  Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = "TEST *********************"
 ' Else
 '  Me.tbRepeatAwardGrp = ""
 ' End If
 ' PrintSSN = True  ' To test  set in report open
  Me.tbSSN = ""
  On Error GoTo nodata
 ' Dim TestIt
 ' TestIt = [Type]
 ' TestIt = [Value]
 ' TestIt = [Win_EXN]
 ' TestIt = [SSN]
  If PrintSSN = True And [Type] <> "T" Then
    'Rev 5.3.0 changes
    
    If (Not IsNull([Value])) And [Value] <> 0 And [Value] <> "" Then ' Prize has a value so may need SSN
                 '   Never give for blank or zero
      If SSNValueTest = 0 Then '  print all SSNs
         
    '  If 100 * [Value] >= SSNValueTest Then   '  SSN Value Test set in report opne
        If [Win_EXN] > 100 Then
        ' Then  '  see if prize value has a $ in it
           Me.tbSSN = "Student SSN: " & [SSN]
        End If
      Else  ' SSNValue = 1 so only those prizes that have SSN in Rpt get printed
        If [Win_EXN] > 100 Then
            If [RptSSN] = 0 Then ' The box is not checked so do not print a ssn
               Me.tbSSN = "Student SSN:  Call Fair Office"
            Else  'RptSSN is checked so include the SSN
               Me.tbSSN = "Student SSN: " & [SSN]
            End If
        End If
       End If
    Else  ' Value is null or blank or zero
      ' TestIt = 0  '  never give ssn if prize has no value
    End If
  End If
nodata:
  'On Error GoTo nodata2
  Me.tbTeam.FontBold = False
  Me.tbTeam.ForeColor = 0
  tbTeam = ""
  'Rev 5.4.0 added Teamex  Note that the query used can return a null TeamEx value for exn < 100
  '   and NCAT comes from the ExhibitData table.  will not contain TEAM if Exn <100
  'If Not IsNull([TeamEx]) Then  ' use next will also work check only exn > 100
  If Win_EXN > 100 Then
    If Me.F_ORD = 1 And Win_EXN > 100 And (Me.TeamEx = True Or InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "TEAM") > 0) Then
      Me.tbTeam.ForeColor = 255
      Me.tbTeam.FontBold = True
      tbTeam = "T# 1"
    End If
    If Me.F_ORD > 1 Then
     'rev 5.4.0 added teamex
     If InStr(1, Me.NCAT, "TEAM") > 0 Or Me.TeamEx = True Then
       If Me.Win_EXN > 100 Then 'And Me.Win_EXN = LastEXN Then  ' have another student for same Prize
        tbTeam = "T# " & Me.F_ORD
       End If
     End If
   End If
  End If
nodata2:
  LastExn = Me.Win_EXN
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Report_NoData(Cancel As Integer)
  MsgBox "No Records Found"
  
  Cancel = True
End Sub

Private Sub Report_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Prior to running the report I must fill in a field used in the sort and
  '   grouping.  The field is in AwardPrize called Script_Sort
  ' For each record in AwardPrize get type and use table AwardPrizeSort to get
  ' the sort order and put it into Script Sort
  ' ALSO  It is difficult to predict and sort etc if EXN and Stud_Num are
  '   Blank (null) so I fix all nulls to '0' here
  PrintSSN = False
  SSNValueTest = 0
  MsgBox ("This report takes serveral minutes to prepare - be patient")
  If MsgBox("Do you want Student Social Security Numbers on the Report?" & vbCrLf & _
            " (If you answer Yes, you will have one more option." & vbCrLf & _
            "  If you answer No, NO SSNs will be printed.", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, _
            "Awards Post Fair Donor's Report") = vbYes Then
     PrintSSN = True
'     Dim testin As String
'Changed Rev 5.3.0
'DoAgain:
'     On Error GoTo DoAgain:
'     testin = InputBox("Enter 'Prize Value' needed to Print Social Security Number" & vbCrLf & _
'                       "Examples: To print SSN for Any Value not zero, Enter .01" & vbCrLf & _
'                       "          To print SSN for Values of $10.00 and higher, Enter 10.00" & vbCrLf & _
'                       "          To print SSN for Values of $75.00 and higher, Enter 75", _
'                       "Social Security Criteria", "01")
'     If testin = "" Then GoTo DoAgain
'     SSNValueTest = 100 * testin  ' Convert to cents
'     On Error GoTo SubError
      If MsgBox("Do you want to limit listing SSNs to ONLY those" & vbCrLf & _
                "prizes that have 'SSN in Rpt' checked? " & vbCrLf & _
                " (If you answer No, all available SSNs will be listed", vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton1, _
                "Select Which SSNs are printed") = vbYes Then
            SSNValueTest = 1
      End If
    ' so, if printssn = true and ssnvaluetest = 1 then limit to if SSN in rpt is checked
    '     if printssn = true and ssnvaluetest = 0 print all SSNs
  End If
  Me.FilterOn = True
  Me.Filter = ""
  Me.Filter = "([Status] = 'A' and [Type] <> 'S')"
 ' Me.Filter = Me.Filter & " and ([awdAN] = 18 )"  'or [awdan] = 44 or [awdan] = 29 or [awdan] = 264 or " & _
 ' "[awdan] = 3 or [awdan] = 29 or [awdan] = 13 or [awdan] = 245 or [win_EXN] = 505 or [win_exn] = 100)"
 '  Above gives some special cases and one of each type to test.
 AwdRetreat = 0
 Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description

End Sub
